original_text: The woman looked at the fruit on the tree. She saw that it would be good to eat, and it was beautiful to look at. She wanted to eat it because it would make her become wise. So she took some fruit and she ate it. Then she gave some of the fruit to her husband who was with her. He also ate it.
korean_text: 여자가 그 나무를 본즉 먹음직도 하고 보암직도 하고 지혜롭게 할 만큼 탐스럽기도 한 나무인지라 여자가 그 열매를 따먹고 자기와 함께 있는 남편에게도 주매 그도 먹은지라

sentences.original_text: The woman looked at the fruit on the tree.
She saw that it would be good to eat,
and it was beautiful to look at.
because it would make her become wise.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그것이 그녀를 지혜롭게 만들 것이라고 생각했기 때문입니다.
그래서 그녀는 열매 몇 개를 따서

sentences.original_text: Then she gave some of the fruit to her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그녀는 남편에게 열매 일부를 주었는데,
